title: City leaders launch Storefront Repair Fund to support small businesses
description:
Mayor Harrell, Councilmember Sara Nelson, and the Seattle Office of Economic Development (OED) announce the launch of the Storefront Repair Fund, which will leverage nearly $2 million dollars of federal funding to repair or reimburse damage to small business storefronts.

Speakers include:
Mayor Bruce Harrell, City of Seattle
Councilmember Sara Nelson, Seattle City Council
Markham McIntyre, Director, Office of Economic Development
Don Blakeney, Executive Director, The U District Partnership
Moe Khan, Cedars Restaurant

View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy
